text: The Emotions is an all female American R&B; group who are well known for their hit single "Best of My Love". This group is from Chicago. It was formed around 1968. It was very popular in the 1970s. Its music has been sampled by several musicians and recording artists. ==References== Category:American girl groups Category:American R&B; bands Category:Musical groups established in 1968 Category:1968 establishments in the United States Category:1960s establishments in Illinois Category:Musical groups from Chicago
title: The Emotions
